page-details.description:
Chained Transformations (Available in v.1.9.0+) Transforms can be chained by naming a series in the suffix.
Transform rules on the left are overwritten by those on the right. Transform rules order is defined from left to right.

text.text:
1. Greyscale

Converts the image to greyscale.

DAM Assets (dam:Asset)

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

text_769675461.text:
2. Resize

Resizes the image to the specified width and/or height.

Pages (cq:Page)

HTTP GET /content/acme/article.transform/feature/image.png

/content/aemdesign-showcase/au/en/content/adobe-consulting-services/named-image-transform.img.jpeg/1368001803506.jpg

>

/content/aemdesign-showcase/au/en/content/adobe-consulting-services/named-image-transform.transform/my-resize/image.png

text_1593530990.text:
3. Bounded Resize (v1.8.0+)

Resizes the image but will not resize past maximum dimension constraints. Accepts two Integer params: height and width. Either width or height will scale to the parameterized limit. The other dimension scale automatically to maintain the original aspect ratio. If the original image is smaller than the configured dimensions the image won’t be resized. Upscale param can be set to true to allow upscaling smaller images.

Image component resources

HTTP GET /content/acme/article/_jcr_content/image.transform/feature/image.png

 

/content/aemdesign-showcase/au/en/content/adobe-consulting-services/named-image-transform/image-component/_jcr_content/article/par/image.img.jpg/1455173324170.jpg

>

/content/aemdesign-showcase/au/en/content/adobe-consulting-services/named-image-transform/image-component/_jcr_content/article/par/image.transform/my-boundedResize/image.png

text_731888436.text:
4. Rotate

Rotates the image.

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg.transform/my-rotate/image.jpg

text_1443285270.text:
5. Crop

Crops the image to the specified bounds

bounds=[x,y,width,height]

smart=[boolean] Defaults to true. Smart bounding will attempt to shift the specified crop-zone to fit within the image dimensions if the crop-zone falls outside the images dimensions.

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.web.1280.1280.jpeg.transform/my-crop/image.jpg

text_2569910.text:
6. Adjust Brightness/Contrast

Adjusts the brightness and contrast of the image.

Note: This utilizes the Adobe CQ Layer adjust(..) method which does not seem to conform w common brightness/contrast expectations.

brightness=[-255 .. 255] (dark to light)

contrast=[positive float] (1.0 does not change contrast. < 1.0 lower contrast. > 1.0 enhance contrast.)

 

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png.transform/my-adjust/image.jpg

text_1074493764.text:
7. Multiply Blend (v.1.8.0+)

Multiplies all of the RGB values of the image against a base color. Follows specification of Multiply blend from Adobe Photoshop (http://helpx.adobe.com/after-effects/using/blending-modes-layer-styles.html#Multiply)

alpha=[0.0..1.0] (Opacity, percentage)

color=[000000..FFFFFF] (Hex Color for use in blending; if specified, overrides all red/green/blue parameters)

red=[0..255] (Red value for use in blending; not required if using color parameter; default value: 255)

green=[0..255] (Green value for use in blending; not required if using color parameter; default value: 255)

blue=[0..255] (Blue value for use in blending; not required if using color parameter; default value: 255)

 

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png.transform/my-mulitply/image.jpg

text_234826583.text:
8. Red/Green/Blue Shift (v.1.8.0+)

Shifts the color of all pixels in an image. Parameters are a percentage of R/G/B value. Omit or set R/G/B shift value to 0 to keep current value. If any element of the color is shifted beyond min/max allowed (0..255) the min/max value is used. Based on http://pixastic.com/lib/docs/actions/coloradjust/

red=[-1.0..1.0] (Percentage, amount of red to shift the image)

green=[-1.0..1.0] (Percentage, amount of green to shift the image)

blue=[-1.0..1.0] (Percentage, amount of blue to shift the image)

 

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png.transform/my-rgbShift/image.jpg

text_599816253.text:
9. Quality (v.1.9.0+)

Adjusts the quality of the output image. This leverages the AEM Product Layer API’s write method, so it only works on JPEGand GIF image types (PNG is not supported).

Quality is always executed LAST, no matter where is appears in the transform list.

quality=[0..100] (0 is lowest quality, 100 is highest) = 20

If quality number is “out of bounds”, 82 will be used (OOTB AEM Default quality)

 

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png.transform/my-quality/image.jpg

text_174120146.text:
10. Scale (v.2.1.0+)

Scale allows percent-based scaling of images.

@scale=decimal representation of percent to scale

Example: 0.25 = 25%

@round=up | down | round

Default: round

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png.transform/my-scale/image.jpg

text_1042966468.text:
11. Letter/Pillar Box (v.2.1.0+)

Adds a Letter/Pillar box support when the specified new dimensions don’t match aspect ratio of original image. The apporopriate boxing will be applied based on best fit for the calculated aspect ratio. The background of the boxing is configurable, however if using JPG encoding transparency is lost resulting in black.

width=[width in px]

height=[height in px]

alpha=[0.0..1.0] (Opacity of background, percentage)

color=[000000..FFFFFF] (Hex Color for use in background)

 

DAM Asset Renditions

HTTP GET /content/dam/images/dog.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/thumbnail.jpg.transform/feature/image.jpg

 

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png

>

/content/dam/aemdesign-showcase/en/components/media/named-image-servlet/sample_photo_04.jpg/_jcr_content/renditions/cq5dam.thumbnail.800.800.png.transform/my-letterPillarBox/image.jpg
